scripts.web: concurrently "npm run server" "cd client && npm run serve-web"
scripts.desktop: concurrently "npm run server" "cd client && npm run serve-electron"
scripts.android: concurrently "npm run server" "cd client && npm run serve-android"
scripts.ios: concurrently "npm run server" "cd client && npm run serve-ios"
scripts.install-all: concurrently "npm install" "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install"
